alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD... NORTHWESTERN HENRICO AND SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeside, or over Virginia Union University, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Ashland, Downtown Richmond, Bon Air, Virginia Union University, Virginia Commonwealth University, Tuckahoe, University Of Richmond, Mechanicsville, Randolph Macon College, Hanover, East Highland Park, Glen Allen, Laurel, Studley, Lakeside, Elmont, Solomons Store, Chamberlayne, and Atlee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
